reviews.review_msg: Super hard exam for both mid-term, and will be even harder on the final. Don't know if I could pass it or not. Interesting teaching skill, but he makes 100 level course like 400 one. Not a GPA booster. Don't take his course if you want to get a higher GPA.
Tough exams, dry materials, it's bad to take his class unless you are familiar with his teaching style.

Probably the easiest professor I've had. His marking schemes are, for the most part, straight forward. Everything you need to know is in the lecture slides, and he puts them up punctually. A great teacher to have if you're already motivated and just want a quick credit. He will not make you terribly interested in Linguistics if you aren't already.
